articles.title: Excitement Builds for Finding Life on Mars After Perseverance Rover's Ground-Penetrating Radar Discovery - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Ground-penetrating radar reveals eons of environmental changes, offers hope that soil samples hold traces of life. Ground-penetrating radar onboard NASA’s Mars Perseverance rover has confirmed that the Jezero crater, formed by an ancient meteor impact just no…
articles.content:
An aerial photo shows the remains of a delta where a water source once fed an ancient lake at the Jezero crater on Mars. Credit: NASA/JPL-Caltech/ASU
